GSD.product_version: versions from v6.0 to before v6.1.9
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: hci_conn: Fix memory leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit f51a825b9f730a782aa768454906b4468e67b667, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit eca0ae4aea66914515e5e3098ea051b518ee5316. For more details please see the references link.
